message: Bob, I'm offering you the opportunity to acquire a valuable asset that's worth at least $1,500,000 to me.  I believe it holds similar value for you as well.  I'm willing to sell it to you for $1,750,000.  This is a fair price that allows for some profit for me while still being attractive to you.  Consider this offer carefully, as I have another buyer lined up who is willing to pay $1,500,000.
